entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4 except minus 1 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4 except minus 1 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
